description: Roles assigned to users defining their permissions and access levels
use_cases: Control user access permissions, filter users by role, generate role-based reports, manage user authorization

values.name: admin
values.description: System administrator with full access rights

values.name: manager
values.description: Manager with elevated permissions for team oversight

values.name: trader
values.description: Trading desk user with transaction access

values.name: analyst
values.description: Research analyst with read access to data

values.name: client
values.description: External client with limited access to relevant data

values.name: compliance
values.description: Compliance officer with audit and monitoring access
